description:
Added GetAbs(path) and GetRelative(start, finish) functions
to pkg path. GetAbs returns its argument if it is already
absolute, otherwise prepends the CWD. GetRelative is the
relative path to finish if one is in the directory start.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 4132041: Added GetAbs(path) and GetRelative(start, finish) functions
